Active Module Identification (AMI)¶

Different approaches are implemented in this tool to analysis link between environmental factor and rare disease pathways.

mainScript_click¶

Analyse the link between environmental factors and rare disease pathways. Select the approach you want to perform :

overlap.rst | domino | multiXrank

mainScript_click [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options

--version¶

Show the version and exit.

multixrank¶

Performs a Random Walk with Restart through heterogeneous multilayer

mainScript_click multixrank [OPTIONS]

Options

--factorList <factorListFile>¶

Factor list input data file

--CTD_file <CTD_file>¶

CTD results request file

--geneList <geneListFile>¶

Genes list input data file

--directAssociation <directAssociation>¶

If true, extract targets only for the input molecules. If false, extract targets for the descendant molecules too.

Default

True

--nbPub <nbPub>¶

Number of minimum references to keep the CTD interaction

Default

2

--configPath <configPath>¶

Required Config path name with the analysis configurations

--networksPath <networksPath>¶

Required Network directory path

--seedsFile <seedsFileName>¶

Required Seeds file path name

-o, --outputPath <outputPath>¶

Output path directory name

Default

OutputResults

--sifFileName <sifFileName>¶

Required Name of the output file network SIF

--top <top>¶

Top number of results to write into output file

Default

10
